content:
770 
 
    (v) ABSU requires ‘O’ level credit passes in English Language, 
Geography and any three (3) of History, Government, 
Economics, Biology, Mathematics, Physics, and Chemistry 
and Agricultural Science.  
(vi) TSUJ and NDU require five (5) 'O' level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, Geography and any two (2) from 
Arts or Social Science subjects  
(vii) BAYERO requires Geography and one (1) other Social Science 
subject.  
(viii) ILORIN requires 'O' level credit pass in Mathematics.  
(ix) BELLS and PHC require ‘O’ level credit pas ses in English 
Language, Geography and any other three (3) subjects.  
(x) LAGOS requires ‘O’ level credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Geography and any two (2) of Economics, 
Government, Further Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and 
Biology.  
(xi) UNIOSUN requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, Geography and any two (2) relevant 
Science, Social Science or Humanities subjects at not more 
than two (2) sittings.  
(xii) KWASU requires ‘O’ level credit passes in Mathematics, 
English Language, Geography and any other two (2) science 
or Social Science subjects and one (1) Science subject 
preferably Physics, Chemistry and Technical Drawing.  
(xiii) NDA requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, Geography and a ny two (2) of Arts 
and Social Science from either History, Economics, 
Government, Civic Education Physics, Chemistry and Biology 
Preference will be given to those having credits in Social 
Science subjects.  
(xiv) KSU requires ‘O’ level credit passes in English L anguage, 
Mathematics, Geography and two (2) other relevant subjects 
in either Sciences or Social Sciences.  
(xv) UNN accepts five (5) 'O' level credit passes including English 
Language, Geography and any three (3) subjects and ‘O’ level 
pass in Mathematics.  
(xvi) NDU requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, Geography and any two (2) from 
Arts, Social Science or Science subjects at not more than two 
(2) sittings.
